flawed_nl_solution:
At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 10/100 = <<100*10/100=1000/1>>1000/1 meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 1000/1 = <<100+1000/1=1100>>1100 meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 1100 x 10/100 = <<1100*10/100=110>>110 meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is 1100 + 110 = <<1100+110=1210>>1210 meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown 1210 - 100 = <<1210-100=1110>>1110 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 1000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
